pageContent: Objective: To report on the high rectal fistula rate associated with salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) after the failure of combined brachytherapy and external beam radiotherapy (EBRT) for prostate cancer; salvage ablative therapy for prostate cancer is indicated when there is local recurrence after RT, brachytherapy or their combination.

metaData.source:
Rectourethral fistula after high-intensity focused ultrasound therapy for prostate cancer and its surgical management
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21215427/
